heading: Sunday
text: Snow north, a combination of wintry mix and rain showers in the valleys tapering off before noon. Periods of sun then increasing clouds. Highs from the mid to upper 30s, with some 40s in the warmer southern valleys. Light southwest wind, turning west at 5 to 15 mph in the afternoon.

heading: Sunday Night
text: Snow showers becoming more scattered overnight. Much cooler. Lows in the teens to near 20. West to northwest wind at 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph with the strongest gusts in the southern Greens.

heading: Monday
text: Variable clouds and sun, with more sunshine in the valleys. Highs from the low to mid 30s, a few 20s sticking around in the northeast.
